neural_progression.title: // PROGRESSION [XP & Ranks]
neural_progression.item1_text: Completing tasks grants Experience Points (XP). Higher priority tasks yield greater rewards.
neural_progression.item2_text: Accumulate enough XP to reach the next operator level. The tracking bar displays your current progression.
neural_progression.item3_text: Leveling up triggers visual feedback and unlocks higher ranks within the system.

system_access.title: // ACCESS [Authentication]
system_access.item1_text1: Create a new account using a Codename (Username), Com-Link (Email), and Access Key (Password).
system_access.item1_warn: ⚠ Email verification is required to activate the account.
system_access.item2_text: Access the grid via your email or codename along with your password.

bio_lock.title: // SECURITY [2FA]
bio_lock.item2: Scan the QR code with an authenticator app.
bio_lock.item3: Enter the 6-digit code to activate. Future logins will require this code.
bio_lock.item4_text: Disabling 2FA reduces your account security significantly.

directive_execution.title: // TASK MANAGEMENT [Operations]
directive_execution.item1_text: Enter your task details and assign a priority. Press ENTER to create the task quickly.
directive_execution.item3_text: Click on any task title to rename it instantly.
directive_execution.item4_text: Click the category or priority badges on a task to change them.
directive_execution.item5_text: Mark tasks as DONE to earn XP and trigger completion effects.

deep_directives.title: // DEEP DIRECTIVES [Files & Intel]
deep_directives.item1_text: Click on a task to open its dossier. You can write rich-text descriptions using Markdown for detailed notes.
deep_directives.item2_text: Include URLs in your description to create secure, clickable links to external resources.
deep_directives.item3_text: Upload important files and images directly to a task for secure storage.

sort_order.title: // SORT ORDER PROTOCOL [Task Management]
sort_order.item1_text: Critical priority. Any directive past its deadline is pinned to the top of the data stream.
sort_order.item2_text: Immediate priority. Directives fated for today follow the Signal Leaks.
sort_order.item3_text: Remaining active directives are sorted by base HIGH > MED > LOW level.
sort_order.item4_text: Completed directives are sorted by the latest completion timestamp (DESC).

category_protocols.title: // CATEGORY PROTOCOLS [Customization]
category_protocols.item1_text: Access your PROFILE to initialize, rename, or delete custom categories.
category_protocols.item2_text: Tag any protocol as STOCKED/DEFAULT (★) to prioritize it in the deployment terminal.
category_protocols.item3_text: Renaming a protocol will retroactively patch all associated archived directives.

neural_search.title: // NEURAL SEARCH & FILTER [Data Retrieval]
neural_search.item1_text: Input keywords into the neural search bar to instantly isolate directives.
neural_search.item2_text: Filter grid by PRIORITY, CATEGORY, or OVERDUE status.
neural_search.item3_text: Execute RESET to clear active filters and restore full data stream.

chrono_sync.title: // CHRONO-SYNC [Scheduling]
chrono_sync.item1_text: Assign execution dates via the CYBER CALENDAR overlay.
chrono_sync.item2_text: Use year navigation controls for long-range planning.
chrono_sync.item3_text: Modify dates directly on active cards via CYBER CONFIRM protocols.
chrono_sync.item4_text: Access the master chronology via the Top Header to view all scheduled directives and interface directly with their Dossiers.

system_resiliency.title: // SYSTEM RESILIENCY [Stability]
system_resiliency.item1_text: The system now utilizes a resilient configuration fallback logic. If `config.local.php` is incomplete, the core grid provides missing parameters (like `DB_HOST`) automatically.
system_resiliency.item2_text: The `install.php` utility now features high-immersion diagnostics, tracking neural link stability and database row counts for immediate verification.

multilingual_sync.title: // MULTILINGUAL SYNC [Language Protocol]
multilingual_sync.item1_text: Utilize the header modules to toggle the neural interface between available languages.
multilingual_sync.item2_text: The grid translates all system directives and parameters instantly after switching.
multilingual_sync.item3_text: Your language preference is locked into your deck's local storage and auto-loaded upon every jack-in.

visual_interface.title: // VISUAL INTERFACE [Theme Switching]
visual_interface.item1_text: Access your PROFILE to toggle between available visual presets. Each theme reconfigures the grid's aesthetic while maintaining core directive integrity.
visual_interface.item2_text: Your visual preference is locked to your neural ID across all sessions until a manual override is initiated.
visual_interface.item3_text: The grid is architected for expansion. New visual modules will be deployed to the theme selector as they are certified for operative use.
visual_interface.theme_cyberpunk: CYBERPUNK — The default neural grid. Neon cyan bleeds through the dark. Your standard operative interface. Stay sharp, stay wired.
visual_interface.theme_lcars: LCARS — Library Computer Access/Retrieval System. Starfleet's finest. Rounded terminals, amber and gold. Space is the final directive.
visual_interface.theme_matrix: MATRIX — The code rain never lies. Green phosphor signals pulse through corrupted silence. You see it, don't you?
visual_interface.theme_weyland: WEYLAND-YUTANI — Corporate amber burns cold. Amber CRT terminals, encrypted by a corporation that built gods and called them products.
visual_interface.theme_robco: PIP-BOY — RobCo Industries unified OS. Phosphor-green terminal. Certified pre-war. The wasteland runs on this firmware.
visual_interface.theme_grid: THE GRID — Tron's digital frontier. Neon blue light cycles across an infinite lattice. Flynn built something that was never meant for humans.
visual_interface.theme_section9: GHOST — Section 9 clearance. A ghost without a shell. Teal holographics flicker across a minimalist dark plane. Kusanagi would approve.
visual_interface.theme_outrun: OUTRUN — 1984. Hot magenta suns sink below the synthwave horizon. Drive fast, the neon doesn't sleep. Retrowave never dies.
visual_interface.theme_steampunk: STEAMPUNK — Victorian iron and burnished brass. Gears click in the fog. An empire powered by steam and secrets. Your directives, delivered by pneumatic tube.
visual_interface.theme_force: FORCE — A galaxy far, far away. Rebel orange glows against a starfield. The light side of the grid. May the directive be with you.
visual_interface.theme_arrakis: ARRAKIS — Desert power and spice. Amber suns sink over a shifting landscape. The grid flows with the spice. Fear is the mind-killer.
visual_interface.theme_renaissance: RENAISSANCE — The cyber-gold era. Amber hexagons pulse in a sea of absolute black. A world of augmentations and corporate gods. Mankind divided.
visual_interface.theme_klingon: QO'NOS (KLINGON) — Blood red and cold steel. Razor-sharp brutalist edges. Today is a good day to code. Qapla'!
visual_interface.theme_got: WESTEROS (GOT) — Ice and Fire. Cold blue steel and Valyrian blood red accents. Winter is coming. The North remembers.
visual_interface.theme_marvel: COMIC (MARVEL) — Heroic red and bold action dots. Pow! Wham! A tribute to the golden age of comic books. Excelsior!
visual_interface.theme_dc: GOTHAM (DC) — Darkest night, deepest blue, and a sliver of yellow light cutting through the rain. Justice never sleeps.
